Class ObligatoryFunction3

  • java.lang.Object
    • ObligatoryFunction3

  • public class ObligatoryFunction3
extends java.lang.Object
    The class dividing given images in stripes and then create the new one from the stripes.
    Author:
    Adam Malysz

      • mode

        static int mode
        The variable storing the option for situation when images are different sizes. 2 - Enlarge smaller one 3 - Shrink bigger one 4 - cut the bigger to the smaller one.
